page.title: 02W.CHILTINGTON HOUSING INTRO.
page.content: In present day W.Chiltington there is a mixture of privately owned and council houses, and flats for old people.There are 907 private homes and bungalows and a big old house converted into 4 flats. There are 46 council homes on two small estates and 28 flats built in 2 storeys only, for old people. There are no high rise flats. Some houses are still being built, mostly of brick, some are tile-hung {Sussex-style}with tiled roofs. Some are made to look old with plaster on the outside, hollow beams and thatched roofs,but were only built 60 years ago There are some very old houses, timber framed with wattle and daub fill that date back to the 15th century. Most of these were originally farm cottages on the original freehold and copyhold farms in the old manors.
